page.title: 01Camberley - an Overview
page.content:
{Camberley}is the largest community in the Borough of Surrey Heath. It lies where the A30 road crosses the valley of the{River Blackwater.
The proximity of an entry point to the {M3 Motorway}has led to an enormous expansion of the population as it is within{commuter distance}of London.
To cope with this influx, the old town has been gutted and re-equipped with a new shopping precinct, rail station, leisure centre and numerous schools.
Camberley is also the home of the {Royal Military Academy,}and of the Staff College of the Army.
Although much of the{heathland}has been built on, much remains and is used as firing ranges.
